name: Blob (itch) (NNNIKKI)
description:
Bombs ahead!

In this manic tower defense game, you are controlling a.. "thingy".. that shoot bullets. You have to shoot the blobs to gain points and also to recover time. If you shoot a bullet to the edge of the screen, then you lose time! Also, there is a highscore saving system.

Controls: Mouse to rotate the thingy, LMB to shoot, Esc to quit.

Made within approx. 4 hours for the 100 lines of code GameMaker Jam. (98 lines)
